original_title: Flat Pack Pop: Sweden's Music Miracle
overview: Journalist James Ballardie explores the uniquely Swedish songwriting formula created by record producer Denniz Pop, discovering how the biggest chart hits of the last 30 years have been inspired by the myths and legends of this Land of the Midnight Sun.
tagline: Charting the remarkable rise of Sweden as a global music superpower.
title: Flat Pack Pop: Sweden's Music Miracle
